name: BestFriend
0:
”Alexa, start best friend”
”Alexa, open best friend”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best friend
des:
In this birthday party game, Alexa quizzes players on how well they know the birthday boy or girl. The birthday boy or girl judges the responses.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Any information you provide to this skill is not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
